comment.body:
> > Facebook has trouble loading content when AdGuard is enabled. On the homepage, only the 1st (or sometimes the first two, if the second is an ad) posts load, no posts beyond that. Search results are just "empty" posts that look like they will load but never do. Multi-photo posts are missing the "right arrow" to go to the next photo. It is not possible to comment because the comment pane does not expand (again looks like it is indefinitely loading).
> 

> Other extensions used:	`Ad Block Plus`

Please first disable Adblock Plus and see if it changes.
